text: The 2015 1. deild was the seventy-second season of second-tier football on the Faroe Islands. Brian Jakobsen scored 32 goals, breaking the goalscoring record in a single season, which would be then broken next year by Leif Niclasen. ==League table== ==Top goalscorers== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !Rank !Player !Team !Goals |- |1 |style="text-align:left;"| Brian Jakobsen |Skála |32 |- |2 |style="text-align:left;"| Jákup Johansen |Skála |19 |- |3 |style="text-align:left;"| Petur Knudsen |NSÍ II |17 |- |rowspan=2|4 |style="text-align:left;"| Holgar Durhuus |07 Vestur |rowspan=2|15 |- |style="text-align:left;"| Jóannes Danielsen |KÍ II |- |5 |style="text-align:left;"| Ari Olsen |B71 |13 |} ==See also== *2015 Faroe Islands Premier League *2015 Faroe Islands Cup ==References== Category:1. deild seasons Category:2015 in Faroe Islands football 1\. deild Faroe Faroe
title: 2015 1. deild
